description.S1: Take the passcode you found on the SubLight agent's body to Catherine in Fallbrook.
description.S2: She'll provide details on how to salvage the Alta-Vitae gas.

blurb.B1: Make your way to Fallbrook, visiting Amber Heights for several quests in the process.
blurb.B2: Talk to Mortimer Bell near the entrance and,
blurb.B4: ask him where to find Catherine Malin,
blurb.B5: and you'll gain Sublight Salvage & Shipping reputation.
blurb.B6: Go to meet Catherine and tell her you're here to fix the problem.
blurb.B7: She says you must syphon the gas from Cascadia's lab into one of your ship's fuel tanks.
blurb.B8: She warns you the town is overrun by Marauders and the lab is swarmed with mantisaurs.
blurb.B9: You can mention that Nyoka can kill them or Ellie can drug them.
blurb.B10: She will tell you technical skills are needed,
blurb.B11: you can mention Parvati or Vicar Max.
blurb.B12: You're to take the gas to the Groundbreaker once you obtain it.

O3.summary: Enter the Secret Lab in Cascadia

description.S1: An abandoned lab in Cascadia houses a rich cache of Alta-Vitae gas.
description.S2: The passwored "ANTEDILUVIAN" should get you inside the hidden lab.

blurb.B1: Head to Cascadia and interact with the terminal near the sealed door containing what you seek (it's inside a building).
blurb.B2: You need to override the system with the password and the door will reveal a lift that takes you to Rizzo Secret Laboratory.
blurb.B3: Be sure to look around Cascadia before you head inside,
blurb.B4: as you can find Zora's Executive Review on another terminal inside Rizzo's.
blurb.B5: This will allow you to use the terminal at the locked gate to Cascadia.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Judging from the blood splatter on your shirt, I take it you visited my favorite cleaner?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Let's talk about something else.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll get back to you on that.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Sure.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Well? I'm half-listening.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Actually, I'm the fixer... for your SubLight problem?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: The boss sent me, you oaf.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: That's enough for now.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Good of you to finally haul your ass over here. I wired for back up weeks ago.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Got something that's going to require special extraction from Cascadia.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Cut to the chase, Malin.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Right, the Alta-Vitae stuff that Lilya mentioned.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I found a passcode on a corpse in Stellar Bay. I guess it grants access to the extraction site?

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: All right, all right.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: One of my runners uncovered a cache of Alta-Vitae Gas, left in a lab when the Board abandoned Cascadia.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: To extract the gas, you'll need to siphon it from the lab in Cascadia into one of your ship's fuel tanks. Totally safe.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I can get it done.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Remind me what Alta-Vitae Gas is, exactly.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Define "safe."

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Are you kidding me?

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: I do like your gumption. But let's not be hasty.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: To get to the gas, you'll need to navigate through the town, which is overrun by marauders.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: The lab itself has become an infested nest, crawling with manties. You got to fight through or figure some other way to exterminate 'em. Maybe the ventilation system?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: No problem. Nyoka's handled mantisaurs before.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Our sawbones, Ellie, could probably cook something up.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I'll find a way around the mantisaurs.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: A sound selection. Nyoka's sturdy, reliable, and don't mind wading knee-deep into guts.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Now, after you clear the manti-nest and reach the storage room, all that's left is to get the gas flowing into the fuel system.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: The task will require someone with technical skills. Or you could force it through with a plasma overload. Don't recommend that option though. Unless you want to get dead.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: The plasma option sounds fun.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Better do this safely. I've only got one ship.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Shall I inscribe that on your tombstone, as well?

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Once you've got our goods, take 'em to the Groundbreaker. Lilya's fencers ought to handle the rest of it.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: I've marked the coordinates for you to the lab in Cascadia. Use the passcode ANTEDILUVIAN on the terminal to get in.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Best of luck, fixer.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: And I'd rather not wait another several weeks for Lilya to send your replacement.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: I shall leave the details to you.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Clever. That's why Lilya's paying you, I take it.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Do I look like one of them egghead science types? All I know is that labs use it to create plants and livestock out of local species.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: But it's a controlled commodity - available only to the Board - so it is of high value on the dark market.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Meaning safe for me and my crew. Seeing as it ain't us undertaking the risk.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Hold your thrusters. I ain't even got to the tricky part.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: So you got a brain on them shoulders. Excellent. Makes my life a world easier.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: "Found it on a corpse," huh? If you killed Lilya's agent, you get to explain it to her. Not me.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: He was dead when I got there.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Well, shit. I knew he'd come to a bad end one day.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Still, no time for weepin' and wailin'. We've got a metric fuckton of bits worth of salvage just waiting for extraction.

dialog.speaker: CatherineMalin (Female)
dialog.utterance: Funny. You don't look like one of Lilya's. Sure sound the part though.
